title: Grimm Fairy Tales Vol. 10
description: For over two hundred years the powerful stories of the Brothers Grimm have enchanted millions around the world, but there has never been an adaptation as intriguing or provocative as this. "Grimm Fairy Tales "Volume 10 continues in the tradition of the series and explores a much darker side of the infamous fables you heard as a child as these classic tales are retold and re-imagined with a terrifying twist you'll simply love as an adult.
author: Joe Brusha
